entries: If OgrÃ©moch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: OgrÃ©moch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: OgrÃ©moch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and ranged weapon attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. 46 (7d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
entries: OgrÃ©moch summons up to three {@creature earth elemental||earth elementals} and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of OgrÃ©moch, and disappear if OgrÃ©moch is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Illuminating Crystals
entries: OgrÃ©moch's crystalline protrusions flare. Each creature within 30 feet of OgrÃ©moch becomes outlined in orange light, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

legendary.name: Stomp (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: OgrÃ©moch stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 30-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that radius must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Create Gargoyle (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: OgrÃ©moch's hit points are reduced by 50 as he breaks off a chunk of his body and places it on the ground in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of him. The chunk of rock instantly transforms into a {@creature gargoyle} and acts on the same initiative count as OgrÃ©moch. OgrÃ©moch can't use this action if he has 50 hit points or fewer. The gargoyle obeys OgrÃ©moch's commands and fights until destroyed.
